settings.title: Upgrade your piercing
settings.text:
All piercings include basic surgical steel jewellery.

We highly recommend our titanium range to promote a healthier piercing! All upgrades are subject to the placement of the piercing.

External Thread Titanium +$10

Internal Thread Titanium +$15

Segment Ring +$5

Swarovski Crystal (internal thread only)+$10

Nose Ring +$10

Glass Retainer +$10

Premium Top (internal thread only) From $20+

Solid 14kt Gold, From $35+

Want to know if you meet our piercing requirements? Call your nearest store or take our online quiz – here.

All piercings require a quick anatomy check. Come and see us for a free consultation!

*Also available (Dahlias, High Nostril and Paired Tongue) not available at all Stores. Please enquire ahead.

Thinking of getting a new piercing? We don’t blame you, that’s a great idea! Using only the best equipment and hygiene methods, our squad of over 100 body piercers are highly trained professionals who pride themselves in every piercing they do.

From private piercing clinics, to using only the highest quality metals, to providing and supporting our customers with after-care to ensure a quick recovery. We work hard to ensure everyone who comes to SkinKandy feels totally comfortable and unquestionably safe!

SkinKandy also offers premium upgrade jewellery, meaning the wait for cute jewellery is over! We can pierce with our premium range and give you the look you want immediately, say goodbye to FOMO!
